com.googlecode.leptonica.android

Class Box

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.leptonica.android.Box

  • public class Box
extends Object
    Wrapper for Leptonica's native BOX.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Box

        public Box(int x,
   int y,
   int w,
   int h)
        Creates a box with the specified geometry. All dimensions should be non-negative and specified in pixels.
        Parameters:
        x - X-coordinate of the top-left corner of the box.
        y - Y-coordinate of the top-left corner of the box.
        w - Width of the box.
        h - Height of the box.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true on success
